summary:
I am a seasoned finance professional with extensive experience with organizational transformation and professionalization in the branded and private label (PL) fast moving consumer goods (FMCG, CPG) and food ingredients industries in Western Europe, Asia and the Middle East and have held senior management positions in startup ('greenfield'), rapidly growing and mature businesses

I am entrepreneurial and result-oriented (hands-on when necessary), ethical, open and transparent, thorough and accurate, persistent, a people manager and teamplayer, have the ability to influence both superiors and direct reports and are able to operate both tactically and strategically

Skills
Manage and transform financially complex business environments, distinguished by high capital intensity, the combination of own, in- and outsourced manufacturing locations geographically spread over various continents, integral value chain responsibility, high number of customer article combinations and internal, group and statutory reporting requirements

-Set-up or transform finance column (people, processes and systems)
-Raise competencies and overall level of professionalism
-Establish stable and accurate (IFRS compliant) registration and reporting
-Implement transactional systems (ERP, SAP), based on the ‘single-version-of- the-truth’ principles
-Implement internal control and risk management systems

Prepare capital expenditure justification proposals (financial modeling and motivation) for asset replacement and business cases for internal and external capacity expansion and business relocation

Establish and maintain international contract manufacturing relations

Act as sparring partner and challenger to Managing Director and MT members

Planning & Control cycle, accounting, controlling, cash flow and treasury (funding, foreign currency risk exposure), working capital, sales & operating planning (S&OP), tax, pensions, legal, IT and project management

Liaise with external parties, such as auditors, bankers, lawyers, tax advisors and inspectors, (credit) insurers and brokers and actuaries
